# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(node_editor LANGUAGES CXX)
set(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID ${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID})

# target
add_executable(node_editor "")
set_target_properties(node_editor PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "NodeEditor")
set_target_properties(node_editor PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_include_directories(node_editor SYSTEM PRIVATE
    C:/Users/User/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/i/imgui/v1.91.9/ec22ab2258d34e549042d113918ca7bf/include
    C:/Users/User/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/i/imgui/v1.91.9/ec22ab2258d34e549042d113918ca7bf/include/imgui
    C:/Users/User/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/i/imgui/v1.91.9/ec22ab2258d34e549042d113918ca7bf/include/backends
    C:/Users/User/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/i/imgui/v1.91.9/ec22ab2258d34e549042d113918ca7bf/include/misc/cpp
    C:/Users/User/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/r/raylib/5.5/ff3f87ca824444c78f4ea6c42aea7e19/include
    C:/Users/User/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/r/raylib-cpp/v5.5.0/c09e9888c7a24446bfbe7fc74d51fc0f/include
)
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(node_editor PRIVATE /EHsc)
elseif(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang")
    target_compile_options(node_editor PRIVATE -fexceptions)
    target_compile_options(node_editor PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
elseif(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
    target_compile_options(node_editor PRIVATE -fexceptions)
endif()
set_target_properties(node_editor PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(node_editor PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    set_property(TARGET node_editor PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreadedDLL")
endif()
target_link_libraries(node_editor PRIVATE
    imgui
    raylib
    opengl32
    imm32
    gdi32
    user32
    winmm
    shell32
)
target_link_directories(node_editor PRIVATE
    C:/Users/User/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/i/imgui/v1.91.9/ec22ab2258d34e549042d113918ca7bf/lib
    C:/Users/User/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/r/raylib/5.5/ff3f87ca824444c78f4ea6c42aea7e19/lib
)
# private sourcefiles from sourcebatch c++.build for target node_editor
target_sources(node_editor PRIVATE 
    src/core/NodeEngine.cpp
    src/Game.cpp
    src/main.cpp
    src/managers/PendingChangesManager.cpp
    src/managers/SceneManager.cpp
    src/scenes/GameScene.cpp
    src/scenes/MenuScene.cpp
    src/utils/Registry.cpp
    src/utils/SceneBase.cpp
)
